extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above.
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from HIST 280/6.0; HIST 281/3.0

basic.description: This course highlights the experiences of women in European history. Topics include: changing ideas about male and female identities, family formations, and sexual politics.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Gender in History: A European Perspective
